title: How to Make Violet Vinegar

steps.headline: Place the violet flowers into the sterilised jar.
Pour the white wine vinegar over the flowers.
Put the lid on the container.
Place the container in a windowsill for several days.
Strain to remove the violet flowers.
steps.description: Use a fine sieve or colander.

steps.headline: Restore the lid to the vinegar and place in the refrigerator for storage.

text: Place the violet flowers into the sterilised jar.  Pour the white wine vinegar over the flowers.  Put the lid on the container.  Place the container in a windowsill for several days.  Strain to remove the violet flowers. Use a fine sieve or colander. Restore the lid to the vinegar and place in the refrigerator for storage.
